roleset.name: to lay off
roleset.note: FURLOUGH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'furlough' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from furlough.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Pilots , as well , routinely fly overtime [*-2] to ensure that none-1 are furloughed [*-1]during seasonal lows .
